attributes.action: Ensure that the speaker of the house wears the traditional dress of the speaker of the house.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the Speaker of the house should wear the traditional dress for speaker of the house. The uniform/dress of the speaker has been eroded by recent speakers but in particularly by Speaker Bercow.

The dress sets him apart from MPs help maintains authority in the house. It is also a tradition that need not be stopped for the sake of doing so.

For the substantial remuneration the speaker is awarded he should be prepared to go to some inconvenience even if he does not like/enjoy wearing the traditional dress.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
